actions.recommendation: Take 50mg of DHEA daily. This may help your body to cope better with stress and increase your metabolism and energy levels
Drinks a bottle of wine once or twice per week. Preferably drink one or two glasses a day than a whole bottle at a time
Cholesterol levels: to try manage with lifestyle only. Take omega 3 supplements 2g daily. Repeat blood after 3 months
Supplement with vitamin D3 5000iu daily and get some sun exposure without getting sunburnt. Repeat level in 3 months aiming for a blood level of 50 to 80ng/ml
Please repeat your full blood count in a month or two when you are well (no cold/flu/virus) so we can monitor the white blood cell levels. They can be low from a recent viral infection
Please watch your alcohol consumption and we will repeat the level with your full blood count.
